normal.name: Acupressure
normal.effect: Sharply raises one of the target's stats at random.

normal.name: After You
normal.effect: The target moves immediately after the user.

normal.name: Assist
normal.effect: The user performs a random move known by another Pokémon in the party.

normal.name: Attract
normal.effect: The target becomes infatuated with the user.

normal.name: Barrage
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Baton Pass
normal.effect: The user switches out, and the incoming Pokémon inherits all of the user's stat changes.

normal.name: Belly Drum
normal.effect: The user sacrifices half of its max HP to maximize its Strength stat.

normal.name: Bestow
normal.effect: The user gives its held item to the target.

normal.name: Bide
normal.effect: The user endures damage for two turns, then deals back double the damage taken.

normal.name: Bind
normal.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

normal.name: Block
normal.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

normal.name: Body Slam
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Paralyzed.

normal.name: Boomburst
normal.effect: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

normal.name: Camouflage
normal.effect: The user's type changes depending on the terrain.

normal.name: Celebrate
normal.effect: No effect. The Pokémon celebrates.

normal.name: Chip Away
normal.effect: Ignores the target's Defense and Evasion boosts.

normal.name: Comet Punch
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Constrict
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target's Dexterity is lowered by 1.

normal.name: Conversion
normal.effect: The user's type changes to the type of the first move in its move list.

normal.name: Conversion 2
normal.effect: The user's type changes to a type that resists the last move that hit it.

normal.name: Copycat
normal.effect: The user copies the last move used.

normal.name: Covet
normal.effect: The user steals the target's held item.

normal.name: Crush Claw
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target's Defense is lowered by 1.

normal.name: Crush Grip
normal.effect: Damage is higher the more HP the target has.

normal.name: Cut
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Defense Curl
normal.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1. Doubles the power of Rollout and Ice Ball.

normal.name: Disable
normal.effect: The last move the target used is disabled for 4 rounds.

normal.name: Dizzy Punch
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

normal.name: Double Hit
normal.effect: This move hits twice.

normal.name: Double Slap
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Double Team
normal.effect: Raises the user's Evasion by 1.

normal.name: Double-Edge
normal.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/3 of the damage dealt.

normal.name: Echoed Voice
normal.effect: If this move is used consecutively, its power increases.

normal.name: Egg Bomb
normal.effect: Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Encore
normal.effect: The target is forced to repeat its last move for 3 rounds.

normal.name: Endeavor
normal.effect: Reduces the target's HP to be equal to the user's current HP.

normal.name: Endure
normal.effect: Priority. The user survives the next hit with at least 1 HP.

normal.name: Entrainment
normal.effect: The target's Ability is changed to match the user's.

normal.name: Explosion
normal.effect: The user faints. Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

normal.name: Extreme Speed
normal.effect: High Priority.

normal.name: Facade
normal.effect: If the user is Burned, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, this move's damage is doubled.

normal.name: Fake Out
normal.effect: High Priority. Causes the target to Flinch. Fails if not used on the first turn.

normal.name: False Swipe
normal.effect: This move cannot reduce the target's HP below 1.

normal.name: Feint
normal.effect: High Priority. This move hits even if the target is using Protect or Detect.

normal.name: Flail
normal.effect: Damage increases the lower the user's HP is.

normal.name: Flash
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1.

normal.name: Focus Energy
normal.effect: Raises the user's critical hit ratio.

normal.name: Follow Me
normal.effect: Priority. All incoming attacks are redirected to the user for this round.

normal.name: Foresight
normal.effect: Ghost-type immunities are ignored. Evasion boosts are ignored.

normal.name: Frustration
normal.effect: Damage increases the lower the user's Happiness is.

normal.name: Fury Attack
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Fury Swipes
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Giga Impact
normal.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

normal.name: Glare
normal.effect: The target is Paralyzed.

normal.name: Growl
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 1.

normal.name: Growth
normal.effect: Raises the user's Strength and Special by 1 (by 2 in Sunny Weather).

normal.name: Guillotine
normal.effect: One-Hit KO move. Very Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Harden
normal.effect: Raises the user's Defense by 1.

normal.name: Head Charge
normal.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 of the damage dealt.

normal.name: Headbutt
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

normal.name: Heal Bell
normal.effect: Cures all status ailments on the user's team.

normal.name: Helping Hand
normal.effect: Priority. Boosts the power of an ally's move by 50%.

normal.name: Hidden Power
normal.effect: This move's type varies depending on the user's individual values.

normal.name: Hold Back
normal.effect: This move cannot reduce the target's HP below 1.

normal.name: Horn Attack
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Horn Drill
normal.effect: One-Hit KO move. Very Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Howl
normal.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 1.

normal.name: Hyper Beam
normal.effect: The user must recharge on the next turn.

normal.name: Hyper Drill
normal.effect: This move hits even if the target is using Protect or Detect.

normal.name: Hyper Fang
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

normal.name: Hyper Voice
normal.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents.

normal.name: Judgment
normal.effect: This move's type changes depending on the Plate held by the user.

normal.name: Laser Focus
normal.effect: The user's next move is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

normal.name: Last Resort
normal.effect: This move can only be used after all other known moves have been used.

normal.name: Leer
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1.

normal.name: Lock-On
normal.effect: The user's next move is guaranteed to hit.

normal.name: Lovely Kiss
normal.effect: Puts the target to sleep. Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Lucky Chant
normal.effect: For 5 rounds, the user and its allies are protected from critical hits.

normal.name: Me First
normal.effect: Priority. The user copies the target's move and uses it with a 50% power boost.

normal.name: Mean Look
normal.effect: The target is trapped and cannot switch out.

normal.name: Mega Kick
normal.effect: Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Mega Punch
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Metronome
normal.effect: The user performs a random move.

normal.name: Milk Drink
normal.effect: The user recovers up to half of its max HP.

normal.name: Mimic
normal.effect: The user copies the last move used by the target, replacing Mimic for the rest of the battle.

normal.name: Mind Reader
normal.effect: The user's next move is guaranteed to hit.

normal.name: Minimize
normal.effect: Raises the user's Evasion by 2.

normal.name: Morning Sun
normal.effect: The user recovers HP. Amount depends on the weather.

normal.name: Multi-Attack
normal.effect: This move's type changes depending on the Memory held by the user.

normal.name: Nature Power
normal.effect: The move's effect changes depending on the terrain.

normal.name: Noble Roar
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Strength and Special by 1.

normal.name: Odor Sleuth
normal.effect: Ghost-type immunities are ignored. Evasion boosts are ignored.

normal.name: Pain Split
normal.effect: The user and the target average their current HP.

normal.name: Pay Day
normal.effect: Scatters coins equal to 5 times the user's level.

normal.name: Perish Song
normal.effect: All Pokémon that hear this song will faint in 3 rounds unless they switch out.

normal.name: Play Nice
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Strength by 1. This move never misses.

normal.name: Population Bomb
normal.effect: This move hits 1 to 10 times.

normal.name: Pound
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Present
normal.effect: This move can either deal damage or heal the target.

normal.name: Protect
normal.effect: Priority. Protects the user from all attacks.

normal.name: Psych Up
normal.effect: The user copies the target's stat changes.

normal.name: Quick Attack
normal.effect: Priority.

normal.name: Rage
normal.effect: If the user is hit after using this move, its Strength is raised by 1.

normal.name: Raging Bull
normal.effect: Destroys Reflect and Light Screen. Type changes based on Tauros's form.

normal.name: Rapid Spin
normal.effect: Removes hazards and trapping effects from the user's side of the field. Raises the user's Dexterity by 1.

normal.name: Razor Wind
normal.effect: The user charges for one turn, then attacks. High Critical Hit Ratio.

normal.name: Recover
normal.effect: The user recovers up to half of its max HP.

normal.name: Recycle
normal.effect: The user recovers a consumed held item.

normal.name: Reflect Type
normal.effect: The user's type changes to match the target's.

normal.name: Refresh
normal.effect: Cures the user of Burn, Poison, and Paralysis.

normal.name: Relic Song
normal.effect: Hits all adjacent opponents. Roll 1d6. On a 6, targets fall asleep. Changes Meloetta's form.

normal.name: Rest
normal.effect: The user falls asleep for two turns, but fully recovers HP and is cured of all status ailments.

normal.name: Retaliate
normal.effect: If an ally fainted on the previous turn, this move's damage is doubled.

normal.name: Return
normal.effect: Damage increases the higher the user's Happiness is.

normal.name: Revelation Dance
normal.effect: This move's type matches the user's primary type.

normal.name: Roar
normal.effect: The target is forced to switch out.

normal.name: Rock Climb
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target is Confused.

normal.name: Round
normal.effect: If other Pokémon use this move in the same round, they will move immediately after the first user and the move's power will be boosted.

normal.name: Safeguard
normal.effect: For 5 rounds, the user and its allies are protected from status ailments.

normal.name: Scary Face
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Dexterity by 2.

normal.name: Scratch
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Screech
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 2.

normal.name: Self-Destruct
normal.effect: The user faints. Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

normal.name: Sharpen
normal.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 1.

normal.name: Shell Smash
normal.effect: Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1, but raises its Strength, Special, and Dexterity by 2.

normal.name: Sing
normal.effect: Puts the target to sleep. Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Sketch
normal.effect: Permanently copies the last move used by the target, replacing Sketch.

normal.name: Skull Bash
normal.effect: The user tucks in its head on the first turn, raising its Defense by 1. On the second turn, it attacks.

normal.name: Slack Off
normal.effect: The user recovers up to half of its max HP.

normal.name: Slam
normal.effect: Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Slash
normal.effect: High Critical Hit Ratio.

normal.name: Sleep Talk
normal.effect: The user performs one of its other moves at random while asleep.

normal.name: Smelling Salts
normal.effect: If the target is Paralyzed, this move's damage is doubled, but the target is cured of Paralysis.

normal.name: Smokescreen
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Accuracy by 1.

normal.name: Snore
normal.effect: Can only be used while asleep. Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches.

normal.name: Soft-Boiled
normal.effect: The user recovers up to half of its max HP.

normal.name: Sonic Boom
normal.effect: This move always deals 20 damage.

normal.name: Spike Cannon
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Spit Up
normal.effect: Releases stockpiled energy. Power depends on the number of stockpiles.

normal.name: Splash
normal.effect: No effect.

normal.name: Stockpile
normal.effect: Raises the user's Defense and Special Defense by 1. Can be used up to 3 times.

normal.name: Stomp
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 6, the target Flinches. Deals double damage to minimized Pokémon.

normal.name: Strength
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Struggle
normal.effect: Used when a Pokémon has no PP left. The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 of its max HP.

normal.name: Stuff Cheeks
normal.effect: The user eats its held Berry and raises its Defense by 2.

normal.name: Substitute
normal.effect: The user sacrifices 1/4 of its max HP to create a substitute that takes damage for it.

normal.name: Super Fang
normal.effect: Reduces the target's current HP by half.

normal.name: Supersonic
normal.effect: Confuses the target. Low Accuracy.

normal.name: Swagger
normal.effect: Raises the target's Strength by 2, but also Confuses it.

normal.name: Swallow
normal.effect: Recovers HP based on the number of stockpiles.

normal.name: Sweet Scent
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Evasion by 1.

normal.name: Swift
normal.effect: This move never misses.

normal.name: Swords Dance
normal.effect: Raises the user's Strength by 2.

normal.name: Tackle
normal.effect: None.

normal.name: Tail Slap
normal.effect: This move hits 2 to 5 times.

normal.name: Tail Whip
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Defense by 1.

normal.name: Take Down
normal.effect: The user takes recoil damage equal to 1/4 of the damage dealt.

normal.name: Tearful Look
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Strength and Special by 1.

normal.name: Teatime
normal.effect: All Pokémon on the field consume their held Berries.

normal.name: Techno Blast
normal.effect: This move's type changes depending on the Drive held by the user.

normal.name: Teeter Dance
normal.effect: Confuses all adjacent Pokémon.

normal.name: Tera Blast
normal.effect: If the user is Terastallized, this move's type becomes the user's Tera Type. If the user's Strength is higher than its Special, this move becomes a physical attack.

normal.name: Thrash
normal.effect: The user attacks for 2-3 rounds and becomes Confused afterward.

normal.name: Tickle
normal.effect: Lowers the target's Strength and Defense by 1.

normal.name: Transform
normal.effect: The user transforms into the target, copying its appearance, stats, moves, and Ability.

normal.name: Tri Attack
normal.effect: Roll 1d6. On a 5 or 6, the target is Burned, Paralyzed, or Frozen.

normal.name: Uproar
normal.effect: The user makes a loud noise for 3 rounds. During this time, no Pokémon on the field can fall asleep.

normal.name: Veevee Volley
normal.effect: Damage increases the higher the user's Happiness is.

normal.name: Weather Ball
normal.effect: This move's type and power change depending on the weather.

normal.name: Wish
normal.effect: At the end of the next round, the user or the Pokémon that switched in recovers up to half of its max HP.

normal.name: Work Up
normal.effect: Raises the user's Strength and Special by 1.

normal.name: Wrap
normal.effect: The target is trapped and takes 1d6 damage at the end of each of its turns for 3 rounds.

normal.name: Wring Out
normal.effect: Damage is higher the more HP the target has.

normal.name: Yawn
normal.effect: The target becomes drowsy and will fall asleep at the end of the next round.
